bibl.title: Parts of Roman Artillery Projectiles from Qasr Ibrim, Egypt.
bibl.note: One wooden foreshaft and two iron bolt-heads (around the years 23-21 BC), now in the British Museum. - The site, and context of the objects. - The iron projectile tips. - The wooden foreshaft. - Discussion.
bibl.seg: JAMES Simon T. and John H. TAYLOR, Parts of Roman Artillery Projectiles from Qasr Ibrim, Egypt.

One wooden foreshaft and two iron bolt-heads (around the years 23-21 BC), now in the British Museum. - The site, and context of the objects. - The iron projectile tips. - The wooden foreshaft. - Discussion.
